background_dashed.customLabel: In School-age (6-12 years old) participants, there is no difference between L-CARNIT and controls on Social-communication. Based on the analysis of the quality of the evidence produced by the 2 clinical trials exploring this effect, we have a very low confidence in the estimation of this effect.
